title: Install without sudo
body:
Can we use Spack without sudo permission?
I got this error message, as you can see below:

/sbin/ldconfig.real: Can't create temporary cache file /etc/ld.so.cache~: Permission denied

[sasha@zatar] (1)$ uname -a
Linux zatar 4.4.0-127-generic #153-Ubuntu SMP Sat May 19 10:58:46 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

